name: Caedendi's Simple Loot Filter
description: Adds a simple customizable loot filter to Diablo 2: Resurrected using D2RMM.
author: Caedendi

config.name: Gold
config.description: Shrink the "Gold" affix to a gold-colored "G".

config.name: Runes
config.description: Remove the "Rune" affix, add rune numbers and highlight important runes.

config.name: Junk
config.description: Shrink, highlight and color the tooltips for potions, scrolls/tomes, bolts/arrows and keys.

config.name: Jewelry
config.description: Customize the tooltips for amulets, rings and jewels.

config.name: Quest Items
config.description: Customize the tooltips for quest items.

config.name: Exclude Horadric Cube
config.description: Exclude Horadric Cube highlighting to fix messing up the cube window's title and some NPC dialog where it is mentioned.

config.name: Endgame Items
config.description: Customize the tooltips for keys, organs, essences, token of absolution and standard of heroes.

config.name: Short Superior/Inferior Prefixes
config.description: Shorten the Superior/Damaged/Cracked/Crude/Low Quality modifiers on weapons and armor to + (plus) and - (minus/dash). Works the same as mod Short Quality Prefixes by Jobus.

config.name: Tooltip width for hidden items
config.description: Set how many spaces wide the tooltip for hidden items is (max 25).

config.name: Tooltip mods
config.description: Modify the size and background opacity of the tooltip for items on the ground and in the inventory.
